title: 多世界如何不刷怪和动物，多世界如何设置成超平坦
author: adsads

replies.author: fzh5837302
replies.txt_content:
adsads 发表于 2014-3-30 12:57
muiltworld的有木有
/world difficulty 0

replies.author: eeeaaa
replies.txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... %5D%3D%26sortid%3D7这里面有你的解决方案。

replies.author: fzh5837302
replies.txt_content:
/mv modify set difficulty 0  就是和平，/mv modify set animals false 关闭动物    


/mv create 世界名 normal -t flat  就可以创造超平坦

第一行需要到相应的世界去设置

replies.author: adsads
replies.txt_content:
